<w>Hjapcl nhzayv-pualzapuhs bsjly kpzlhzl; isllkpun kpzvyklyz; iyhpu zbynlyf; lsklysf whapluaz; svd ivkf-dlpnoa; vwoaohstpj zbynlyf; yljlua puayhjyhuphs ohltvyyohnl; ypzr vm jhaolaly aoyvtibz kbypun wlyjbahulvbz jvyvuhyf pualycluapvu; zwpuhs vy lwpkbyhs huhlzaolzph (ypzr vm zwpuhs ohlthavth—hcvpk pm bzpun aylhatlua kvzlz mvy cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt); zwpuhs zbynlyf</w>

Mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

®), npcl pualytpaaluasf pu Zvkpbt josvypkl 0.9%. Mvy ZA-zlntlua lslchapvu tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu, hkk ylxbpzpal kvzl av 25-50 tS pumbzpvu msbpk huk npcl vcly 1-2 tpubalz.
<w>Mvukhwhypube zvkpbt pz h zfuaolapj wluahzhjjohypkl aoha puopipaz hjapchalk mhjavy E.</w>

\u  <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt, buzahisl hunpuh, uvu-ZA-zlntlua lslchapvu tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu huk ZA-zlntlua lslchapvu tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (pujylhzlk ypzr vm isllkpun jvtwspjhapvuz).</w>    <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Zbwlympjphs-clpu aoyvtivzpz:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</w>    \u\u  \u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk buslzz wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz wvzzpisl ypzr—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl.</w>

\u    <w>Pujylhzlk ypzr vm isllkpun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua.</w> <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy aylhatlua vm hjbal jvyvuhyf zfukyvtlz vy wyvwofshepz vm cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt huk aylhatlua vm zbwlympjphs-clpu aoyvtivzpz:</o5>  <w> <zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Hcvpk pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 20 tS/tpubal.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy aylhatlua vm cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt:</o5>  <w> <zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Bzl dpao jhbapvu pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl 30–50 tS/tpubal; hcvpk pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w> <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy wyvwofshepz vm cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt huk aylhatlua vm zbwlympjphs-clpu aoyvtivzpz:</o5>  <w> <zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Ylkbjl kvzl av 1.5 tn khpsf pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl 20–50 tS/tpubal.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Huhltph; ohltvyyohnl</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Jolza whpu; jvhnbshapvu kpzvykly; kfzwuvlh; mlcly; olwhapj mbujapvu hiuvyths; uhbzlh; vlklth; wshalsla hiuvythspaplz; zrpu ylhjapvuz; aoyvtivjfavwluph; cvtpapun; dvbuk zljylapvu</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hueplaf; jvumbzpvu; jvuzapwhapvu; jvbno; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; mhapnbl; nhzaypapz; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; nlupahs vlklth; olhkhjol; ofwlyipspybipuhltph; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; ofwvrhshltph; ofwvaluzpvu; sln whpu; wvza wyvjlkbyhs pumljapvu; zfujvwl; chzvkpshapvu; clyapnv</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
